result.eng: What does he say when he doesn't have the right answer?
result.ga: Cad a deir sé nuair nach mbíonn an freagra ceart aige
result.orig: Cad a deir sé nuair nach mbíonn an freagra ceart aige
result.html: Cad a deir sé nuair nach mbíonn an freagra ceart aigeWhat does he say when he doesn't have the right answer?
result.ponchtml: Cad a deir sé nuair naċ mbíonn an freagra ceart aigeWhat does he say when he doesn't have the right answer?

result.eng: He tells me he has no money.
result.ga: Deir sé liom nach bhfuil airgead aige
result.orig: Deir sé liom nach bhfuil airgead aige
result.html: Deir sé liom nach bhfuil airgead aigeHe tells me he has no money.
result.ponchtml: Deir sé liom naċ ḃfuil airgead aigeHe tells me he has no money.

result.eng: She will accept anything you tell her.
result.ga: Glacfaidh sí le rud ar bith a deir tú léi
result.orig: Glacfaidh sí le rud ar bith a deir tú léi
result.html: Glacfaidh sí le rud ar bith a deir tú léiShe will accept anything you tell her.
result.ponchtml: Glacfaiḋ sí le rud ar biṫ a deir tú léiShe will accept anything you tell her.

result.eng: Everybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ga: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.orig: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.html: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ponchtml: Deir gaċ éinne a ḃí beo i 1963 gur cuiṁin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar ċuala siad faoi ḋúnṁarú an Uaċtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.

result.eng: Some people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ga: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.orig: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.html: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ponchtml: Táṫar ann a deir naċ raiḃ in ionsaiṫe an 11ú Meán Foṁair aċ leiṫscéal do Ṁeiriceá cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
